## NodeCanvasRenderingContext2D.putImageData() method

Replace a region of the canvas with the supplied ImageData.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
putImageData(imageData: IImageData, dx: number, dy: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  imageData | <code>IImageData</code> |  |
|  dx | <code>number</code> | The x coordinate of the region. |
|  dy | <code>number</code> | The y coordinate of the region. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
